step.cmd: Enter your search term in the Filter results bar.
step.stepresult: A list of all results containing your search term will be displayed, showing their Record #, Speaker, and Result. If there are no results, this list will be empty.To search within a specific column (or multiple columns), click the drop down arrow to the left of the search bar and select it in the list. Options are also available to allow you to Use regular expression or to make your search Case sensitive.

step.cmd: To clear the Search bar, click Clear field/X.
